00026 #ifndef __SYS_INCLUDE_ARCH_X86_RT_SCHED_PROTO_H_
00027 #define __SYS_INCLUDE_ARCH_X86_RT_SCHED_PROTO_H_
00028 
00029 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00030 #include <l4/sys/syscalls.h>
00031 
00032 #define L4_RT_ADD_TIMESLICE 1   
00033 #define L4_RT_REM_TIMESLICES  2   
00034 #define L4_RT_SET_PERIOD  3   
00035 #define L4_RT_BEGIN_PERIODIC  4   
00036 #define L4_RT_BEGIN_PERIODIC_NS 5   
00037 #define L4_RT_END_PERIODIC  6   
00038 #define L4_RT_CHANGE_TIMESLICE  7   
00040 #define L4_RT_NEXT_PERIOD 0x10 
00041 #define L4_RT_PREEMPTION_ID 0x20 
00044 typedef struct {
00045     l4_uint64_t time:56;        
00046     l4_uint64_t id:7;           
00047     l4_uint64_t type:1;         
00048 } l4_rt_preemption_val_t;
00050 typedef struct {
00051     l4_uint32_t time_high:24;   
00052     l4_uint32_t id:7;           
00053     l4_uint32_t type:1;         
00054 } l4_rt_preemption_val32_t;
00056 typedef union {
00057     l4_low_high_t lh;          
00058     l4_rt_preemption_val_t p;  
00059 } l4_rt_preemption_t;
00060 
00061  /* preemption ipc types: values of the type field */
00062 #define L4_RT_PREEMPT_DEADLINE  0 
00063 #define L4_RT_PREEMPT_TIMESLICE 1

00302 L4_INLINE l4_threadid_t
00303 l4_preemption_id(l4_threadid_t id)
00304 {
00305   //id.id.chief |= L4_RT_PREEMPTION_ID;
00306   return id;
00307 }
00308 
00309 L4_INLINE l4_threadid_t
00310 l4_next_period_id(l4_threadid_t id)
00311 {
00312   //id.id.chief |= L4_RT_NEXT_PERIOD;
00313   return id;
00314 }
